# AVCaption.TextCombine.oneDigit

**Case**

An option that makes one digit upright.

## Declaration

```swift
case oneDigit
```

## Text combine options

- **AVCaption.TextCombine.all**: An option that combines all of the characters.
- **AVCaption.TextCombine.none**: An option that doesn’t combine text upright.
- **AVCaption.TextCombine.twoDigits**: An option that combines two consecutive digits.
- **AVCaption.TextCombine.threeDigits**: An option that combines three consecutive digits.
- **AVCaption.TextCombine.fourDigits**: An option that combines four consecutive digits.
